General.Name: River Tech plc
General.Description: River Tech p.l.c., a technology company, provides software solutions. It offers B2B technology products, as well as secure and tailormade solutions for the delivery of services within the online sphere. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in St Julian's, Malta.
General.Address: Aragon House Business Cente, St. Julian's, Malta, STJ 3140
